title: Miffed Sidhu throws a tantrum in Priyanka's presence; BJP mocks 'humiliation' - Hindustan Times
content:
1. Miffed Sidhu throws a tantrum in Priyanka's presence; BJP mocks 'humiliation'  Hindustan Times
  2. Navjot Singh Sidhu refuses to address Priyanka Gandhi's Sangrur rally, fuels speculation of rift  Times Now
  3. Navjot Singh Sidhu refuses to address rally in Priyanka Vadra's presence post CM face snub  Republic World
  4. Navjot Singh Sidhu miffed with Priyanka Gandhi, refuses to address rally in Dhuri  India Today
  5. Sidhu declines to address Priyanka's rally in Sangrur  Times of India
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Even though Punjab Congress Chief Navjot Sidhu openly backed Charanjit Singh Channi's candidacy as the Punjab Chief Minister face for Congress, Sidhu seems to be visibly upset with Congress High Command's decision. The rift came out in public, when Sidhu refused to address a rally in Punjab's Dhuri in presence of Congress leader Priyanka Gandhi. When his name was called out on the stage, Sidhu gestured from his seat to let CM Channi speak first. Priyanka Gandhi was campaigning for Balvir Singh Goldy who is contesting from Dhuri Assembly seat in Sangrur constituency against AAP Candidate Bhagwant Mann. Watch this video for more details.
